summary: Pennsylvania, 1859. Railroad tycoon Brennan (Alan Hale) is muscling in on oil-drilling farmers, led by Peter Cortland (Randolph Scott). Cortland must try to save their oil business, while also saving his marriage to Sally (Irene Dunne).
cast: Irene Dunne|Randolph Scott|Dorothy Lamour|Elizabeth Patterson|Raymond Walburn|Charles Bickford|Akim Tamiroff|Ben Blue|William Frawley|Alan Hale|Irving Pichel|Stanley Andrews|James Burke|Roger Imhof|Lucien Littlefield|Purnell Pratt|Edward Gargan|Carol Adams|Constance Bergen|Billy Bletcher|Monte Blue|Horace G. Brown|Raymond Brown|Tommy Bupp|Marjorie Cameron|Louise Carver|Jack Rube Clifford|Sherry Hall|Dell Henderson|Russell Hopton|Edward Keane|Lew Kelly|Paul Kruger|Helen Lowell|George MacQuarrie|John Marshall|Claire McDowell|Robert Milasch|Ivan Miller|Philip Morris|John T. Murray|Rolfe Sedan|Harry Semels|Frank Shannon|John M. Sullivan|Frank Sully|Dorothy Vernon|Fred Warren|Pat West|Ernest Wood
title: La furia del oro negro
